hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
homedir=`pwd` echo $homedir
# Install build dependencies sudo yum install -y git wget tar make bzip2 unzip gcc gcc-c++ python-devel make autoconf net-tools python-setuptools python-lxml python-ldap sqlite-devel openldap-devel libxslt-devel openssl-devel libffi-devel openssl libtool libbz2-devel sudo easy_install pip
# Install required packages using pip sudo pip install paramiko httplib2 passlib six patch 'django<2.0' call coverage==3.7.1 coveralls funcsigs pyzmq PyYAML pycrypto cryptography==2.0.3 msgpack-python jinja2 psutil futures tornado
# Download source code git clone https://github.com/saltstack/salt cd salt git checkout v2017.7.2
# Install saltstack and check version cd .. sudo pip install -e ./salt salt --version
# Configure Salt master and minion
mkdir -p etc/salt/ cp ./salt/conf/master ./salt/conf/minion etc/salt/ cd etc/salt/
# Edit config file master as shown below sed -i 's/#user: root/user: root/g' master sed -i 's,#root_dir: /,'"root_dir: $homedir"',' master
# Edit config file minion as shown below sed -i 's/#master: salt/master: localhost/g' minion sed -i 's/#user: root/user: root/g' minion sed -i 's,#root_dir: /,'"root_dir: $homedir"',' minion
# Start the master and minion, accept the minion's key, and verify your local Salt installation is working cd $homedir sudo salt-master -c ./etc/salt -d sudo salt-minion -c ./etc/salt -d sleep 1m sudo salt-key -c ./etc/salt -L sudo salt-key -c ./etc/salt -A -y sudo salt -c ./etc/salt '*' test.ping || true # Check master, minion process
ps -ef | grep salt
# Unit and integration tests (optional) #cd $homedir/salt #sudo pip install git+https://github.com/saltstack/salt-testing.git#egg=SaltTesting #sudo pip install -r requirements/dev_python27.txt #sudo ./setup.py test
# **Note:** Test failures seen in the following modules can be ignore as these are not related to IBM z Systems:_ # _Module Tests, State Tests, Shell Tests, NetAPI Tests, Salt Unit Test_
